thread.title: Alphabet’s Waymo Unit to Buy up to 62,000 Chrysler Minivans for Driverless Program

author: Tim Higgins
title: Alphabet’s Waymo Unit to Buy up to 62,000 Chrysler Minivans for Driverless Program

organizations.name: chrysler minivans for driverless program waymo llc

text:
Waymo LLC plans to dramatically increase the number of driverless vehicles it has on the road in the coming years, announcing Thursday a deal to buy as many as 62,000 minivans from Fiat Chrysler Automobiles NV.
The move also marks the beginning of discussions between Fiat and Waymo, the self-driving vehicle division of Google-parent Alphabet Inc., to sell fully self-driving vehicles to customers.
